review_details: Food and service so lovely here. Patio feels private, dined under a lemon tree and the whole meal was clearly prepared with love ❤️

Had a fantastic afternoon on the water with captain Dimitris. Toured breathtaking islands near Skiathos, private beaches, to a special spot he knew about for urchins and fouscas (type of oyster) where he proceeded to dive, bring on deck and prepare a feast. HIGHLY recommend! He was professional and easy going the entire journey and had everything to make the trip special including music, cold beer and a fresh fruit platter he made up on the spot. Will remember always

Calamari will be hard to surpass even for me and the EasyGreek! Epic meal!!! Server Sonny fantastic and so intuitive ✨
Lobster cream sauce on halibut and potatoes, homemade strawberry sorbet with white chocolate and shortcake. Both dreaming about this meal for a very long time, will go back for sure.
